column4: hey guys, i just updated to 12.04 64. in the last version my additional mediakeys on my keaboard worked just fine but now they dont. any ideas?
it's often the case with these programs that you need to delete the config files and start over. You will lose you settings though
i never installed any additional software to get the mediakeys/volumecontrol running.
well i just realized the mediabuttons are working just the volume control doesnt
